HeadComp.title: Send SMS API | SMS API Integration in PHP - MSG91
HeadComp.description: Revolutionary communication APIs designed with developers in mind. Read more.

DevelopersComp.heading: Hello Developers
DevelopersComp.subheading: Integrate SMS, Email, Voice API with Java, PHP, HTTP Scripts. Build apps, innovation and ideas for rapid growing business, or just integrate for your team development.

integrate.heading: One API to revolutionalise the way developers integrate
integrate.subheading: Just integrate and forget the rest of the challenges.
integrate.content: A single, unified API to simplify communication across multiple architectures. Build integrations faster and deliver a unified experience across channels for faster performance, more productivity and greater innovation.

communication.heading: We enable communication in your awesome products

msg91api.heading: Why MSG91 API is developer friendly for real?

comp.heading: Powerful sending infrastructure
comp.content: Easy API integration and a simple, HTTP or JSON/XML API enables your App with Text, Voice and Email functionality. Scale quickly, whether itâ€™s a matter of communicating to 10 users or 10 million. Build exactly what you need with flexible APIs.

comp.heading: Tracking and analytics
comp.content: Searchable logs means you always know what is happening to your messages, while tags make it easy to report on your data and all that via our efficient panel and webhooks.

comp.heading: Manage your contact and SMS campaigns wisely
comp.content: Track and optimise your SMS campaign and know how your customer is interacting with your messages.

customcode.heading: Start your custom code adventure now
customcode.content: Easily integrate MSG91 APIs for Sending SMS, OTP verification or communicate across channels. Access sample codes in Ruby, Python, PHP, Java and more.

setup.heading: 5 Minute Setup
setup.description: Build real-time communications into your apps in a few minutes and a few lines of code.The SDKs seamlessly connect to MSG91 global infrastructure.
